member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Functional.Extensions.CollectionAndStatusExtensions
member.summary: Helpers for applying Result<IEnumerable<T>, Exception> to UI collections and mapping Result to short status messages.
Awaits a task that returns a Result of an enumerable and replaces the contents of the target collection on success, or invokes the onError handler on failure.

member.summary: Maps a Result to a human-friendly status string. If the result is a success, calls successFormatter; if error, returns the error message (or uses errorFormatter if provided).

member.name: T:AStar.Dev.Functional.Extensions.TryExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for the Try class to convert Result types. These extensions allow for converting Result types with exceptions to Result types with ErrorResponse.

member.name: M:AStar.Dev.Functional.Extensions.TryExtensions.ToErrorResponse``1(AStar.Dev.Functional.Extensions.Result{``0,System.Exception})
member.summary: Converts a Result with an Exception to a Result with an ErrorResponse (specifically, the base exception message is mapped to the ErrorResponse - please note: NO translation happens...).
member.typeparam: The type of the successful result
member.param: The Result object being extended.
member.returns: A success result without change if applicable, otherwise, the exception will be mapped to an ErrorResponse
